document_data.name: incarnation of angels
document_data.mainbody: '''''Incarnation of angels''''' was an advanced [[utterance]] from the Lexicon of the Evolving Mind that used [[truespeak]] to connect a target to the [[upper planes]], or to the [[lower planes]], if reversed.
document_data.Usage: In its straight form, the silver grace and golden might of the Upper Planes suffused the target, granting them the abilities of a [[celestial]] being. In the reversed form, the target gained cunning and strength from the depths of Hell, granting it the abilities of a [[fiendish]] creature. Both lasted for about half a minute.
document_data.History: The utterance was known to [[word archon]]s.{{cite book/Tome of Magic 3.5|265}}
